channel.title: LukeParkerDev
channel.description: My personal website acting as a personal portfolio as well as a blog to share my knowledge.

item.title: Blazor WASM SEO - You have a broken website according to Google!
item.description: A quick and painless guide to fixing your Blazor WASM SEO.
item.author: lukeparkerdev@outlook.com (Luke Parker)

item.title: Building a Beautiful OKR with AntBlazor - Part 0
item.description: An introduction to the series, and what exactly an 'OKR' is.
item.author: lukeparkerdev@outlook.com (Luke Parker)

item.title: Rapid Backend Development with Marten DB
item.description: Building a personal project can be exciting, but it can also be a lot of work. In this post, I will go over how to use Marten DB to quickly build a backend for your project.
item.author: lukeparkerdev@outlook.com (Luke Parker)

item.title: Building a Beautiful OKR with AntBlazor - Part 1
item.description: Setup the project boilerplate, the get DevOps working with Docker, Docker-Compose, GitHub Actions, Cloudflare, NGINX and your VPS of choice!
item.author: lukeparkerdev@outlook.com (Luke Parker)

item.title: Why I switched to Rider from Visual Studio for C# Development
item.description: An overview of what drove me away from Visual Studio - and my first impressions of Rider.
item.author: lukeparkerdev@outlook.com (Luke Parker)

item.title: Building a Beautiful OKR with AntBlazor - Part 2
item.description: Building out the backend with core models and repository interfaces. Then, we mock the data for UI building!
item.author: lukeparkerdev@outlook.com (Luke Parker)

item.title: Building a Beautiful OKR with AntBlazor - Part 3
item.description: Building out the frontend with AntBlazor components.
item.author: lukeparkerdev@outlook.com (Luke Parker)
